step_feedback.feedback: Great start! Keep your fingers closed into fists and arms drawn in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally to shoulder height. Exhale and relax your muscles as you do this.
Excellent! You're maintaining good form. Continue to open your fingers and extend arms horizontally while exhaling and relaxing.
Good job on this step. Ensure your arms are extending horizontally to shoulder height as you exhale and relax.
Fantastic execution of the first repetition! You're opening fingers and extending arms well. Keep up the great work.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to close your fingers into fists and draw your arms in, inhaling and tightening.
Well done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Continue to exhale and relax your muscles during this movement.
Great form on this step. Keep opening your fingers and extending arms horizontally while exhaling and relaxing.
Good continuation. Ensure your arms are extending horizontally to shoulder height as you exhale and relax.
Excellent finish to your second repetition! You're effectively opening your fingers and extending your arms. Great job overall!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to focus on closing your fists and drawing arms in while inhaling and tightening, then opening fingers and extending arms while exhaling and relaxing. Keep practicing this smooth motion.
